text: Hey kids!
Guess who's here
Yes it's me Bob...
Join me for Learning Street with Bob
Hey Kids! Welcome to Bob Learning Street!
Today let's go meet the transport vehicles!
They are transportation from airport to bus station They take us wherever we want with no hesitation
They are transportation from airport to bus station They take us wherever we want with no hesitation

Meet Mr Bus He goes on his way 
You hop on and off As he drives through the day

Meet Mr Taxi You can tell it where to go 
And then you keep relaxing As it drives fast or slow
They are transportation From airport to bus station They take us wherever we want With no hesitation
They are transportation From airport to bus station They take us wherever we want With no hesitation

Meet Mr Garbage Truck It cleans up the trash all the waste and the muck
That would give you a rash

Meet Mr Fire truck Awaiting emergency 
Then it rushes to the spot So full of efficiency
They are transportation From airport to bus station They take us wherever we want With no hesitation
They are transportation From airport to bus station They take us wherever we want With no hesitation
And here comes Miss Ambulance The kindest you have met When she's needed most She is fast as a jet

Meet Mr Airplane The king of the skies 
He dashes through the clouds As higher he flies
They are transportation From airport to bus station They take us wherever we want With no hesitation
They are transportation From airport to bus station They take us wherever we want With no hesitation
